name: Multidisciplinary and multiagency reviews
text: §321‑472  Multidisciplinary and multiagency reviews.  The department shall conduct multidisciplinary and multiagency reviews of domestic violence fatalities, near-deaths, and suicides to reduce the incidence of preventable intimate partner homicides.  The director may form domestic violence fatality review teams, as necessary, by appointing individuals to review domestic violence fatalities.  A domestic violence fatality review team shall not be subject to part I, chapter 92. [L 2006, c 82, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 203, §1]
